title: Chocolate covered digestive biscuits
ingredients: ['150g plain wholemeal flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '30g rolled oats', '20g wheat bran', '100g muscovado sugar', '50g unsalted butter, cut into small pieces', '4 tablespoons milk, or as needed', '110g plain chocolate, chopped']
